casebody.data:
Wednesday, November 18, 1998

MERIT DOCKET

98-1759. Miller v. State.

In Mandamus. On answer of respondent by Reginald A. Wilkinson, motion to dismiss by Honorable Ruth Ann Franks, and motion for order allowing relator access to law library. Sua sponte, cause dismissed.

Motee, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
